alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 3:58AM PST until February 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory above 2000 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch above 1500 feet, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Central Douglas County, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County, Eastern Douglas County Foothills and Jackson County. This includes Toketee Falls, Prospect, and Butte Falls. This also includes Highway 138 east of Steamboat, and portions of Highways 140, 62, and 227. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 AM to 4 PM PST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County
